citations.narrative:
Two prairie vole pups managed to escape their enclosure during a bedding change by an employee. The employee was
not aware the pups escaped and did not replace them into their enclosure. Another staff member opened the door to the
main room, found the pups, and replaced them into their enclosure. It is imperative that all animal technicians or
personnel involved in animal care are adequately trained and qualified to perform their duties. If they are not adequately
trained, animals can become injured, lost, or die due to inappropriate handling and care. Correct by ensuring all staff that
are involved in animal care are qualified to perform their duties. Correct by 31 January 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, Clinical Veterinarian, and IACUC
Administrator.
n

narrative:
2.32(a) 
   
Personnel qualifications. 
Two prairie vole pups managed to escape their enclosure during a bedding change by an employee. The employee was 
not aware the pups escaped and did not replace them into their enclosure. Another staff member opened the door to the 
main room, found the pups, and replaced them into their enclosure. It is imperative that all animal technicians or 
personnel involved in animal care are adequately trained and qualified to perform their duties. If they are not adequately 
trained, animals can become injured, lost, or die due to inappropriate handling and care. Correct by ensuring all staff that 
are involved in animal care are qualified to perform their duties. Correct by 31 January 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, Clinical Veterinarian, and IACUC 
Administrator. 
 
 n
